title: About Me
description: My background, journey into tech, and personal interests. > whoami

title: Skills Matrix
description: Core competencies and technologies I work with. > system_monitor skills

title: Project Showcase
description: A selection of my key projects and development work. > ls ./projects

title: Work Experience
description: My professional roles and contributions. > cat work_history.log

title: Education
description: My academic qualifications and achievements. > show_degrees --all

title: Certificate
description: My professional certificates and credentials. > verify_certs --all

title: Blog Archive
description: Thoughts, tutorials, and insights on tech topics. > tail -f /var/log/blog.log

title: Courses
description: Significant courses I've undertaken for skill enhancement. > list_courses --completed

title: Connect
description: Let's connect! Find my profiles or send a message. > establish_connection -p social
